articles.title: Solar storm alert: Still coming! 2.1m mph flare 'remains threat' – 'direct hit' in HOURS - Daily Express
articles.description: A SOLAR STORM travelling at an eye-watering 2.1 million mph 'remains a threat' and is set to make a 'direct hit' with Earth in hours after NASA warned of a 'significant' eruption from the Sun.

articles.title: Natural Resources on Mars Could Produce Rocket Fuel, Say Researchers - IGN - IGN
articles.description: A new study has discovered that future astronauts who find themselves on Mars may be able to use its natural resources to help make rocket fuel that could assist in getting them back to Earth.

articles.title: A NASA spacecraft just saw the north pole of Europa, the icy moon of Jupiter, for the first time - Space.com
articles.description: This distant view will get even better next year when the spacecraft zooms up close to the icy moon.
articles.content: The Juno spacecraft captured the north pole region of Europa for the first time, from a distance. NASA officials said it's their first view of the region and future flybys will offer a clearer look. … [+3237 chars]
